2097320.name: RPG Maker MZ - Retro RPG SFX Pack
2097320.description:
This pack contains 207 sound effects for Retro RPG Attacks, UI Sounds, Magic, Movement, Jingles & more!

Features:

► Attacks (Magic Spells, Sword Slice, etc...)
► UI Sounds (Classic UI, Hover, Selection, etc...)
► Impacts (Damage, Hit Impact, Explosions, etc...)
► Musical Sounds (Buffs, Positive & Negative Jingles, etc...)
► Enemy Defeat, Item Collect & much more!

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
2097320.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 韩语
